products.name: PLYN (Procurement automation AI SaaS)
products.detail: We automate procurement end-to-end: multi-step workflows with no human intervention, expert-level decisions (negotiation strategy, alternatives, execution plans), and day-to-day communication via email/phone/messengers. Our goal isn’t to minimize human-in-the-loop, but to make it unnecessary

products.mainCategory: AI & Digital Intelligence
products.subCategory: Industry-specific AI Applications
products.name: Amfibian (Semiconductor Manufacturing Process Control Platform)
products.detail:
Amfibian™ is an on-premise AI process control platform that predicts process conditions and derives optimal recipe and control parameters based on semiconductor mass-production data.

Its key differentiator is that process engineers—without relying on developers or data scientists—can directly create, modify, validate, and deploy models. An intuitive model-building framework combined with a digital twin–based pre-validation system enables scenario testing and risk assessment before deployment. In operation, the platform provides stabilization features including monitoring and rollback.

By integrating equipment, metrology, and historical data, Amfibian performs virtual metrology (VM) and control optimization, delivering not only diagnostics but also concrete adjustment guidance. Designed as an add-on to existing MES and APC environments, it allows rapid deployment and is scalable from CMP to a wide range of semiconductor processes.

products.mainCategory: Immersive Spatial Tech
products.subCategory: Digital Twin Platforms
products.name: Building Oasis BLOS (Integrated Smart Water Management System based on Digital Twin)
products.detail:
Features: A 'Building Water Purification Plant' solution installed at the main water inlet of the mechanical room to improve, monitor, and optimize water quality throughout the entire building in real-time. It visualizes complex piping networks through Digital Twin technology and manages water conditions remotely. It provides technology that blocks external impurities to supply clean water like a purifier throughout the building, preventing pipe corrosion due to aging, improving rust water, and preventing slime formation caused by bacterial growth.

Strategy: Essential for LEED 'Water Efficiency (WE)' credits via chemical-free treatment. It drastically reduces maintenance costs and carbon emissions compared to traditional purifiers through real-time flow and water quality data analytics.

products.name: Ultra Lowlight Camera
products.detail:
Our latest camera solution, designed for powerful night surveillance. It can provide Full HD color footage under the very low light conditions like star-light.
It features cutting-edge night vision technology with ultra-low latency.
It is available in two models. DB-1 is a basic bullet type model. DH-2 is an ultra-compact mini model, suitable for integration with drone and missile systems. It weighs only 47g and measures just 30×30(mm).

products.name: Video Enhancer
products.detail:
Greentel provides smart video enhancement solutions for critical surveillance in various conditions.
Greentel’s video enhancer enhances blurry footage from CCTV, EO/IR, drones in bad weather like fog, rain, lowlight. Without replacing or discarding the existing system, it can highly improve the image quality of existing system. It is currently being operated in Korea Airforce, Army, Maritime Police, and it can be applied to every sites where important video surveillance systems are in operation.

products.name: FlowPilot (Edge AI Engine)
products.detail:
A manufacturing-specialized Edge AI engine that analyzes and controls shop floor data in real-time to minimize quality gaps.
1. Improve Quality: Maintains consistent product quality by preemptively blocking factors that cause defects.
2. Save Energy & Costs: Maximize operational efficiency by reducing waste through real-time process analysis.
3. Fast AI Deployment: Get instant results with quick, data-driven optimization—no complex training required.

products.subCategory: Intelligent IoT, Electric Vehicles, Digital Twin Platforms, Smart Home/Office/Work Solutions, IoT Devices
products.name: NRK-FR500 (3ch MPoE Repeater)
products.detail:
This product is a high-performance 3-channel repeater incorporating N-ARK’s proprietary MPoE technology.

It can extend up to three channels simultaneously with a single device, offering excellent installation efficiency.

By amplifying and extending both power and data transmission at the same time, it maintains stable performance even in long-distance environments.

It minimizes voltage drop, ensuring reliable power delivery to high-power devices.

By reducing wiring work and minimizing the number of required devices, it provides cost savings and easier maintenance.

It is a next-generation power and communication extension solution optimized for multi-channel and high-power environments, including CCTV, AI cameras, industrial networks, and smart infrastructure.

products.name: NRK-P6405 (MPoE Injector)
products.detail:
This product is a 60W high-power injector based on N-ARK’s proprietary MPoE technology.
Compared to conventional PoE, it enables higher power transmission, providing stable power supply to high-performance network devices.
By delivering both power and data through a single cable, it simplifies wiring structures and reduces installation costs.
It minimizes voltage drop even over long distances, ensuring stable power delivery and reliable data communication quality.
It is a next-generation power transmission solution suitable for various high-power network environments, including CCTV, AI cameras, industrial equipment, and smart infrastructure.

products.name: PLE (AC Power & Data Integrated Transmission Device)
products.detail:
This product is an integrated transmission device that delivers AC power and communication signals simultaneously through a single cable.

There is no need to install separate power and communication lines, making installation simple and cost-effective.

It enables stable data transmission even over long distances and is suitable for AI, robotics, aerospace, defense, and various network equipment applications.

By simplifying the wiring structure, it reduces installation time and improves maintenance efficiency, providing a next-generation power and communication integrated solution.

products.mainCategory: AI & Digital Intelligence, Smart Life & Data Tech
products.subCategory: Multimodal AI, Industry-specific AI Applications, Smart Home/Office/Work Solutions
products.name: MACS(Multi-modal AI for Camera Solution)
products.detail:
MACS: Context-Aware Intelligent Video Analytics

MACS is an advanced, multi-modal AI-driven CCTV analysis system that goes beyond simple object detection to understand situational context and detect complex anomalies in real-time.

The core strength of MACS lies in its "human-like" contextual understanding. While traditional AI focuses on identifying objects, MACS interprets the meaning behind actions—such as "a person collapsing" or "a motorcycle operating without a helmet." This is achieved through sophisticated Vision-Language Model (VLM) technology, which analyzes video and text data simultaneously.

Unlike conventional detection systems, MACS utilizes VLM to enable complex situational awareness even with minimal training data. Furthermore, our lightweight architecture allows for more CCTV channels per GPU, offering superior scalability and cost-efficiency.

MACS features real-time threat detection and instant alerts, enabling immediate response to emergencies. Our technology is certified by major Korean authorities (KISA, KTL), boasting an F1-score of over 96 and a detection accuracy of 90%+ in complex environments.

From falls and fires to trespassing and crowd density, MACS provides flexible detection types tailored to your needs. It is the ideal solution for urban surveillance, industrial sites, ports, airports, and luxury resorts.

products.mainCategory: Immersive Spatial Tech, Smart Life & Data Tech
products.subCategory: Immersive Interfaces, Smart Home/Office/Work Solutions
products.name: Magconn Technology
products.detail:
Magconn technology is magnetic wireless charging & data sync solution and it can be applied for all the mobile devices and accessories. 

Magconn is same as USB in terms of function (power & data), but the UI (user interface) is different.
Conventional USB interface is plug-in/plug-out, but Magconn is simply attach/detach.

Magconn technology has been applied for Smartphone, Tablet PC, Action camera, Bike light & GPS Tracker, mPOS, Barcode/RFID reader, Medical device, iPhone & Android phone cases and accessories, Automotive accessories, etc. in global market

products.name: TMC(Industrial Thermal Camera)
products.detail: The TMC series is an industrial thermal camera for real-time temperature monitoring in semiconductor, battery, and electronics manufacturing. It enables early detection of anomalies to improve process stability and productivity. The technology can also be applied to mobility and road safety systems, supporting thermal monitoring for vehicles and infrastructure.
